coloradocollege.ifroning
Class PlayerInventory

java.lang.Object
  coloradocollege.ifroning.Inventory
      coloradocollege.ifroning.PlayerInventory

public class PlayerInventory
extends Inventory

A player inventory is a specialized inventory that is assigned to a player.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ian Froning

Constructor Summary
PlayerInventory(Player thePlayer)
          Constructs an inventory belonging to a player.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String drop(Item anItem)
          Drops an item from the inventory so that it lands in the player's current location.
